title: Caravan no. 75
testimonial: For me, Saturday was an opportunity to really know why I opted for this university. I've discovered that besides studying there is also the pride you feel after you've helped someone in need. The patients left with a diagnosis, but I left with new personal values which I couldn't attain other than by participating in this volunteering experience.

title: Caravan no. 74
testimonial: Thank you! We, the PetroMed team, are proud to have partnered up with you last weekend in Valea Mare! Working together, we better understood the actual value of your project, which is a great example of volunteering and medical service for disadvataged communities!

title: Caravan no. 67
testimonial: A day spent with the Caravana cu Medici (Medical Doctors' Caravan) is an investment for the future. It's an invesment in people. It reminds me why we do what we do, that medicine is with and about people. Compasion is not out of style. People matter. In fact they're all that matters. - Costescu Amelia MD, Obstetrics and Gynecology resident

title: Caravan no. 66
testimonial: We want to increase access to specialized medicine for the women who live in the most isolated community of the Danube Delta. We would not have been able to organize the event so quickly and efficiently without the help of the Caravan cu Medici (Medical Doctors’ Caravan) and we are grateful for their effort. It was a true marathon! Such projects should happen constantly and even become guaranteed by the state. - Loredana Pană –  project manager for Letea in UNESCO Association
